original_text: The Levites were Jeshua, Binnui, Kadmiel, Sherebiah, Judah, and also Mattaniah, who, together with his associates, was in charge of the songs of thanksgiving.
korean_text: 레위 사람들은 예수아와 빈누이와 갓미엘과 세레뱌와 유다와 맛다냐니 이 맛다냐는 그의 형제와 함께 찬송하는 일을 맡았고

sentences.original_text: The Levites were Jeshua, Binnui, Kadmiel, Sherebiah, Judah, and also Mattaniah
